text: Vladimir Alekseyevich Khodus (; born 13 July 1952) is a Russian football manager and a former player. ==External links== * Category:1952 births Category:People from Petrovsky District, Stavropol Krai Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Dynamo Stavropol players Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya players Category:FC Stal Kamianske players Category:FC Spartak Kostroma players Category:FC Torpedo Zaporizhia players Category:Soviet football managers Category:Russian football managers Category:FC Vorskla Poltava managers Category:Russian expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Ukraine Category:Russian expatriate sportspeople in Ukraine Category:Expatriate football managers in Poland Category:Expatriate football managers in Lebanon Category:Expatriate football managers in Oman Category:SC Olkom Melitopol managers Category:FC Metalurh Zaporizhya managers Category:FC Znamya Truda Orekhovo-Zuyevo managers Category:Crimean Premier League managers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Kafa Feodosiya managers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Stavropol Krai
title: Vladimir Khodus
